page.title: 11Housing.
page.content: Welwyn Garden City The housing in our square can best be described as low density .every house has a garden front and back ,even flats have open gardens or grass .The whole square is characterised by a feeling of openess.It is a very relaxed environment dominated by trees. The housing stock,built between 1938/1955,is varied and comprises 725 terraced houses,262 semi-detached,50 detached,42 flats.The variety means that people of all ages and families of all different sizes live together in the same community. Many people are now buying their own houses from the council and are making improvements to them. modernisation includes double-glazing, extensions,garages,porches and new doors.
